title: Shocked
creator_contributor_role: Victorian College of the Arts, School of Film and Television, production company
subject_group: Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Interactive media
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Mental illness
abstract: Interactive based on research into the taboo topic of post-natal depression and interviews with pactioners of ECT (Electro-convulsive therapy).
description: Shocked takes takes you on a psychological journey with Jessica and you are asked to determine her future. Jessica's perfect perfect world crumbles after the birth of her first child. The increasing pace and often chaotic nature of the interface and soundscape matches the chaotic world that Jessica inhabits. Shocked; game-like in its interactivity, is so real it makes you question your own values, and is so compelling you won't be able to stop.
